SGBotic:
Makecode block for thermal printer

SGBotic blocks
SGBotic.backGroundColor: Set text background color to white/black
SGBotic.printNumBuffer: Store number in printer memory. Require "New line" command to print
SGBotic.printNumBuffer|param|num: is number to be stored, eg: 123
SGBotic.printNum|param|num: is number to be printed, eg: 123
SGBotic.printStringBuffer: Store text in printer memory. Require "New line" command to print
SGBotic.printStringBuffer|param|s: is string to be stored, eg: "Hello World"
SGBotic.printString|param|s: is string to be printed, eg: "Hello"
SGBotic.setCharacterSize|param|Height: is to set character height, eg: 0
SGBotic.setCharacterSize|param|Width: is to set character width, eg: 0
SGBotic.setDensityBreakTime: Set printing density (1  to 15) and break time (1 to 15)
SGBotic.setDensityBreakTime|param|BreakT: is to set print break time, eg: 10
SGBotic.setDensityBreakTime|param|Densit: is to set printing density, eg: 10
SGBotic.setHeating: Set heating duration (4  to 255, default 80) and interval (2 to 255, default 2)
SGBotic.setHeating|param|heatInterval: is to set heating interval, eg: 2
SGBotic.setHeating|param|heatTime: is to set heating duration, eg: 80
SGBotic.setLineSpacing|param|lineSpace: is to set the line spacing, eg: 30
SGBotic.setTextAlign: Align text to left, centre or right
